姽字的基本解释

姽
guǐ
〔姽婳〕形容女子娴雅，美好，如“既姽姽于幽静兮，又婆娑乎人间”。

姽字的汉语字典释义

[①]［guǐ］
［《廣韻》過委切，上紙，見。］
［《廣韻》魚毁切，上紙，疑。］
娴静美好貌。参见“姽嫿”。

姽字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　姽； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页261第19
【廣韻】過委切【集韻】古委切，?音詭。【說文】閑體行姽姽也。【宋玉·神女賦】旣姽嫿於幽靜。　又【集韻】五委切，音頠。【博雅】好也。

姽字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
姽字的起名意思

形容女子体态娴静美好，也指面貌姣好。

quiet and nice
Basic explanation of words
quiet and nice
guǐ
〔姽婳〕Describes a woman elegant and beautiful, such as "being beautiful in the quiet, but also whirling in the world".

["Guangyun" has been cut, put on paper, see you. ]
["Guangyun" fish is destroyed and cut, put on paper, suspicious. ]
Demure and beautiful. See "姽婳".

[Chou Ji 2] [Female Character Department] 　姽; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 261 Page 19
[Guang Yun] Gu Weiqie [Jiyun] Ancient Weiqie, sound tricky. [Said the text] The leisure body is also beautiful. [Song Yu·Goddess' Fu] Beautiful and beautiful in the quiet.　[Jiyun] The five elements are cut, and the sound is 頠. [Bo Ya] Good too.
